property.name: Text
property.value: While Hoster Tully is participating in a challenge, each other participating House Tully character you control gains renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a House Tully character gains power, discard 1 gold from The Tumblestone to stand that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a unique King or Lord character you control is killed, search your deck for a unique King or Lord character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge by 5 or more STR, each Lady character you control gains 1 power. (Max 1 per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you collect income, gain 1 gold for every 2 [thenightswatch] locations you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, if you have a higher reserve value than an opponent, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After you lose a [power] challenge, the winning opponent takes control of Fickle Bannerman unless you discard 1 gold from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win dominance, discard 1 power from your faction card to choose 2 characters. Each of those characters gains 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Stone Crows is attacking, discard 1 gold from it to have the losing opponent choose and kill a defending character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control an attacking Clansman character, put a Clansman character into play from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a character enters play from your dead pile, choose a Drowned God character and have it gain 1 power. (Limit twice per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: While there are more Winter plot cards than Summer plot cards revealed, reduce the initiative value on each opponent's revealed plot card by 3, and the reserve value on each opponent's revealed plot card by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Ghiscari Elite is knelt, choose an attachment or event in your discard pile, and place it on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Kneel Slaver's Bay Port to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if an opponent has 4 or more characters in his or her dead pile.)

property.name: Text
property.value: You are considered to have X additional plot cards in your used pile. X is the number of gold Ricasso has.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR for each plot card in your used pile and gains a challenge icon of your choice. Reaction: After you lose a challenge, pay 1 gold to return The Prince's Plan from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ygritte cannot be knelt by card effects. While you control another Wildling character, Ygritte gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your minimum deck size is 75 cards. You may run 2 Banner agendas in addition to this agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: Card abilities cannot cause characters to enter play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After you win a challenge, the losing opponent may draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard 1 gold from Bear Island Host to choose a House Mormont character. Until the end of the phase, that character does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character cannot participate in challenges against you. Forced Interrupt: When attached character leaves play, sacrifice a character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Knight of the Reach is attacking or defending alone, choose a Lady character. That character gains 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +X STR and gains intimidate. X is the printed STR of the top character in your dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard 1 gold from Gilly to choose a Steward character you control. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Choose a character with printed cost 3 or lower in an opponent's discard pile, and put it into play under your control. Reaction: After you win a challenge as the defending player, pay 1 gold to return Guarding the Realm from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win dominance, choose an opponent and look at his or her hand. Then, choose and discard 1 card from that hand. If that card is a character, place it in its owner's dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: [baratheon] or R'hllor character only. Reaction: After the dominance phase begins, stand attached character and gain 1 gold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After Polliver discards a character using pillage, return 2 gold from the losing opponent's gold pool to the treasury.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel The Hand's Solar to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains an intrigue icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Wex Pyke is attacking, each character with printed cost X cannot be declared as a defender. X is the number of gold Wex Pyke has. Dominance Action: Move 1 gold from your gold pool to Wex Pyke. (Limit twice per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Kneel Iron Islands Market to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if an opponent has 8 or more cards in his or her discard pile.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, sacrifice Second Sons unless you discard 1 gold from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Choose a character without attachments. That character gets -2 STR until the end of the phase. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a participating Dragon character or Daenerys Targaryen, pay 1 gold to return A Dragon Is No Slave from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard 1 gold from Orphan of the Greenblood to return another character you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a character with fewer than 2 challenge icons is declared as an attacker or defender, kneel and sacrifice Scorching Deserts to remove that character from the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the third challenge you initiate each phase, Black Walder gains renown and gets +2 STR for each gold he has.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Kneel Great Hall to reduce the cost of the next unique character you marshal this phase by 1. (By 2 instead if that character's printed cost is 6 or higher.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose an opponent. If that player has a higher power total than you, gain 2 gold. If that player has more cards in his or her hand than you, gain 1 power for your faction. If that player controls more characters than you, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player may play events in his or her discard pile as if they were in his or her hand. Forced Reaction: After an event is placed in a discard pile, remove it from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Roaming Wolfpack is attacking, each attacking Direwolf character gets +2 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges Action: Each player sacrifices a character or location. Reaction: After a character you control is killed, pay 1 gold to return The North Remembers from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may marshal or play 1 additional limited card each round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains stealth. While attached character is participating in a challenge, reduce the cost of each event you play by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may choose not to stand Recruiter for the Watch during the standing phase. Marshaling Action: Kneel Recruiter for the Watch to choose a character with printed cost 2 or lower. Take control of that character until Recruiter for the Watch stands or leaves play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Kneel Underground Vault to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if the gold value on an opponent's revealed plot card is 5 or higher.)

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Dominance phase, Flea Bottom Bastard gets +3 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a character you control is killed, sacrifice Spears of the Merling King to return that character to your hand instead of placing it in your dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Cersei's Attendant is participating in a challenge against an opponent with no cards in his or her hand, Cersei's Attendant gains insight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After attached character is knelt, discard 1 gold from Fever Dreams to draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Theon Greyjoy is attacking alone, each character with a higher STR than his does not contribute its STR to the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ironborn character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is attacking, move 1 gold from the losing opponent's gold pool to your own.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: During a challenge in which Grey Worm is attacking, choose a defending character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets -3 STR. (Limit once per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Kneel Astapor to choose a participating character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gets -X STR. X is the number of gold Astapor has.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Maester of Sunspear is participating, choose an attachment and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshaling Action: Kneel Dornish Fiefdom to gain 1 gold. (2 gold instead if you are not the first player.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you initiate a challenge, Frey Lordling gets +1 STR until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the third challenge you initiate each phase, if you control an attacking House Frey character, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose and kneel a location. Then, if that location is Contested, discard it from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Choose an opponent. That player chooses 2 non-Army characters, each with printed cost 6 or higher. Then, that player chooses and kneels 1 of those characters. Kill the other (cannot be saved). Card design by 2014 North American Champion, Jonathan Andrews.
